attributes.action: stop post mortem examinations and use other methods i.e scans as alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A very important and fundamental principle should be remembered with regards to the human body in that the human body, whether dead or alive, is considered sacred according to Islam. Thus cutting it, mutilating it and tampering with it in any way is considered blameworthy and unlawful. 
Moreover, in carrying out a post-mortem, the body of the deceased person will be stripped naked. This, in itself, is also not permitted.

We as Muslim Brothers and Sisters need to support each other and spread the message to one another about how wrong and shameful it is for this country to allow post-mortem examinations.
